user.name: Jeff Atwood
user.description: Is it more interesting to talk about software than it is to develop software?

status.text: I could show you 5 or 6 places where Linq makes the code easier but *destroys* perf. Depends what you need. And knowing how/why.

user.name: Jeff Atwood
user.description: Is it more interesting to talk about software than it is to develop software?

status.text: @robconery *and* it performs dramatically better, too! SQL is pretty much the ultimate ORM. I like LINQ because it lets us do both.
